attributes.action: DEMAND A STOP to the MADDNESS outside our SCHOOL
attributes.additional_details:
This pettition is being made out of pure amazment that people still park oposite school entrances and for a change in the road rules concerning Black Street in the village of Martham.
These are the changes we need to see for the safety of all our children.
1) People need to stopped from parking opposite both the ENTRANCE AND EXIT to Martham Primary School located  on
Black St, Martham
2) During school pick up and drop off times Black Street itself needs to be turned into a one way road.
3) Two Zebra crossing need to be placed aswell with one that leads from the churchyard path between white street and black street.
With the other being placed on the corner between Black street and Staithe Road.
